title: Shepherd's Pie
instructions: Boil potatoes until tender, then mash with butter and milk. Season and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet. Sauté onion, carrots, and celery until softened.
Add garlic, rosemary, and thyme. Cook for 1 minute.
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up.
Stir in tomato paste and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in red wine and scrape up browned bits. Simmer until reduced slightly.
Stir in beef broth mixed with cornstarch. Bring to a simmer until thickened.
Transfer beef mixture to a baking dish.
Spread mashed potatoes evenly over the top.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
